scripts.build: cross-env RENDER_MARKDOWN=true PROCESS_IMAGE=true kissmyresume build ./resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-mocha-responsive
scripts.serve: cross-env RENDER_MARKDOWN=true PROCESS_IMAGE=true kissmyresume serve ./resume.json --theme jsonresume-theme-mocha-responsive
scripts.markdown: resume export markdown.html -r resume.json -t markdown && mv -f markdown.html readme.md
